Merlot:
You need to get Proof of Preparation - 20000 pcs. from monsters - Devil Warrior, Devil Nightmare, Devil Varos, Devil Sinist, Devil Guardian, Death Rogue, Death Shooter, Death Warrior, Death Sorcerer, Death Pondus, Demonic Warrior, Demonic Wizard, Demonic Weiss, Demonic Keras, Demonic Archer in Atelia Refinery or Nymph Astra, Nymph Lily, Nymph rose, Nymph Tulip, Afros, Nymph Sentinel in Enchanted Valley.
How to get Proof of Preparation - 20,000 pcs. from monsters, come to me and get a reward.
